text: A cantarito is a tequila-based highballhttps://www.thespruceeats.com/cantarito-cocktail-recipe-760805 paloma- like cocktail served in a clay cup known as a jarrito that helps keep the drink cold. It can contain ingredients such as agave, lemon juice, lime juice, grapefruit juice, orange juice, sea salt, and grapefruit soda (or lemonade or limeade). The cantarito is popular in Mexico but not as well known in the United States. ==References== Category:Citrus cocktails Category:Cocktails with tequila Category:Cocktails with orange juice Category:Cocktails with grapefruit juice Category:Cocktails with lemon juice Category:Cocktails with lime juice Category:Cocktails with lemonade
title: Cantarito
